class.name: ImageBlender
class.brief_description: Provides advanced image blending methods (derived from OpenGL specification).
class.description: Sets up a custom blending method if the blending methods provided by Godot's [Image] class do not meet the user's criteria. This class uses two equations: one for the RGB values, and another one for the alpha value. This class's default behavior is the same as [method Image.blend_rect].

method.name: blend_rect
method.description: Blends [code]src_rect[/code] from [code]src[/code] image to [code]dst[/code] image at coordinates [code]dst_pos[/code].

method.name: stamp_rect
method.description: Stamps [code]src_rect[/code] from [code]src[/code] image to [code]dst[/code] image in a straight line from [code]dst_init_pos[/code] to [code]dst_end_pos[/code], with a certain [code]spacing[/code] between stamps.
